TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit OrderedDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class OrderedDictionary Implements IDeserializationCallback, IDictionary, IOrderedDictionary, ISerializable

summary.span: 表示可通过键或索引访问的键/值对的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are accessible by the key or index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个元素是存储在一个键/值对对象。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 密钥不能为`null`，但可以是一个值。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 元素未排序的键与不同的元素类。The elements of an are not sorted by the key, unlike the elements of a class. 你可以访问元素的键或索引。You can access elements either by the key or by the index. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回对象的集合中每个元素的类型。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns objects that are of the type of each element in the collection. 由于每个元素的集合是一个键/值对，元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the collection is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型是。Instead, the element type is . 下面的代码演示 C#、 Visual Basic 和 c + + 语法。The following code shows C#, Visual Basic and C++ syntax. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/source2.cpp#06)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/source2.cs#06)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/source2.vb#06)] `foreach`语句是枚举数，仅允许从，不写入集合读取周围的包装器。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建、 填充和修改集合，以及两种方法显示的内容： 一个使用和属性和其他创建一个枚举器通过方法。The following code example demonstrates the creation, population and modification of an collection, as well as two techniques to display the contents of the : one using the and properties and the other creating an enumerator through the method. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#00)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#00)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的所有键必须是唯一的集合。Every key in a collection must be unique. 默认比较器是密钥的实现。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和填充集合。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的所有键必须是唯一的集合。Every key in a collection must be unique. 默认比较器是密钥的实现。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自定义比较器使这种情况下为执行使用不区分大小写的字符串的查找。The custom comparer enables such scenarios as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥不能为`null`，但可以是一个值。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 你还可以使用中不存在要添加新元素的键的值设置属性集合; 但是，如果指定的键已存在于，则设置属性将会覆盖旧值。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the collection; however, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素，但改为引发。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements but instead throws . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和填充集合。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用方法，属性设置为零，并且集合的元素对其他对象的引用也被释放。After calling the method, the property is set to zero and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 由于调用此方法不会更改容量。The capacity is not changed as a result of calling this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中，方法用于空，，然后重新填充。In this example, the method is used to empty the , and then the is repopulated. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以返回一个 null 值，如果密钥不存在或如果该键`null`。Using the property can return a null value if the key does not exist or if the key is `null`. 使用方法来确定特定键是否存在于集合。Use the method to determine if a specific key exists in the collection. 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象和方法`item`以确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定和方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中，方法用于确定在尝试将其删除之前是否存在一个条目。In this example, the method is used to determine if an entry exists before attempting to remove it. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IDictionaryEnumerator

summary.span: 返回一个循环访问 集合的 对象。

span.span: Returns an object that iterates through the collection.
An object for the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，使用`foreach`建议而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法以显示的内容到控制台的集合。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to display the contents of the collection to the console. 在此示例中，方法用于获取到显示的内容的方法传递的对象。In this example, the method is used to obtain an object that is passed to a method that displays the contents. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#03)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#03)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#03)] [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#05)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#05)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#05)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`参数等于中的条目数集合，`key`和`value`参数追加到集合的末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the number of entries in the collection, the `key` and `value` parameters are appended to the end of the collection. 接下来将插入点的条目将下移以容纳新的条目并移动的项索引也将更新。Entries that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new entry and the indexes of the moved entries are also updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中，方法用于将新条目添加到的开头，向下移动的项的其余部分。In this example, the method is used to add a new entry to the beginning of the , moving the rest of the entries down. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合使用的包装器禁止修改集合;因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modification of the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中，属性用于确定是否可以修改。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the can be modified. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指定的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the specified value.

Default Public Property Item(index As Integer) As Object

span.span: Gets or sets the value at the specified index.

value.span: 在指定索引处的项的值。

span.span: The value of the item at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许你通过使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[index]`。This property allows you to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.

is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public object this[object key] { get; set; }
Default Public Property Item(key As Object) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[System::Object ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::Object ^ key); void set(System::Object ^ key, System::Object ^ value); };

param.name: key
param.span: 要获取或设置的值的键。

span.span: The key of the value to get or set.

summary.span: 获取或设置具有指定键的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value with the specified key.

value.span: 与指定的键相关联的值。

span.span: The value associated with the specified key.

value.span: 如果未找到指定的键，尝试获取它将返回 ，尝试设置它将使用指定的键创建新元素。

span.span: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns , and attempting to set it creates a new element using the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许你通过使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[key]`。This property allows you to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 你还可以使用中不存在要添加新元素的键的值设置属性集合 (例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the collection (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`). 但是，如果指定的键已存在于，则设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 密钥不能为`null`，但可以是一个值。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 若要区分`null`返回因为找不到指定的键和`null`返回指定键的值是因为`null`，使用方法来确定键是否存在于.To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中，属性用于修改字典条目具有键`"testKey2"`。In this example, the property is used to modify the dictionary entry with the key `"testKey2"`. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回对象不是静态的副本; 相反，引用回原始中的键集合。The returned object is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original collection. 因此，更改为继续才会反映在。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和填充集合，然后打印到控制台的内容。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection, and then prints the contents to the console. 在此示例中，和属性传递到方法，它显示内容。In this example, the and properties are passed to a method that displays the contents. 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接下来的条目被删除的条目将上移以占据空出的位置，并移动的项的索引也将更新。The entries that follow the removed entry move up to occupy the vacated spot and the indexes of the entries that move are also updated. 如果集合不包含具有指定键，一个条目保持不变且不引发异常。If the collection does not contain an entry with the specified key, the remains unchanged and no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示修改集合。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中，方法用于删除具有键的项`"keyToDelete"`从。In this example, the method is used to remove the entry with the key `"keyToDelete"` from the . 此代码是可以在查看更大的代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at .
